name: CY_Auto_tests
description: Test Automation Solution for UI Test Automation Playground

scripts.test:login: export CYPRESS_VIEWPORT_WIDTH=1920;export CYPRESS_VIEWPORT_HEIGHT=1080; npx cypress run --env ENV='local' --browser firefox --headless --spec 'cypress/e2e/regression/sample_app.spec.cy.js'
